# Final Output Template

Use this layout when saving the delivery-ready Markdown for a single article.
The pipeline now appends each processed (non-duplicate) article to this file
by default. Set `FINAL_OUTPUT_PATH` to override the destination during tests
or alternative deployments.

Matched buyers: ['Netflix']

Title: Netflix Chief Product Officer Eunice Kim To Exit

Category: Org -> Exec Changes

Content: Exit: Eunice Kim, Chief Product Officer at Netflix ([9/10](https://deadline.com/2025/09/netflix-chief-product-officer-eunice-kim-exits-1236528052/))

Date: (2025-09-10T20:39:39+00:00)

URL: https://deadline.com/2025/09/netflix-chief-product-officer-eunice-kim-exits-1236528052/

- Keep the buyers list in square brackets, even when there is only one match.
- Keep the publish timestamp in ISO 8601 inside parentheses to avoid timezone confusion.
